title: IP values per game (wins)
body: just thought i'd put this up

replies.body:
TT is easier to carry on because it's loaded with bots. Assuming Riot finds a way to handle this and they're working on their ban waves recently. The queue times will become much larger.

This is also assuming they have the same queue time now.
i added 30 seconds,  based on queue time difference in the expected wait times
